# Description

`repmix` is an R package for Bayesian estimation and testing of effect sizes based on data from an original study and its replication using a mixture prior framework. For more information, see the [ArXiv preprint](https://arxiv.org/abs/2406.19152).

# Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/SamCH93/repmix) with

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("SamCH93/repmix")
```
